name: Blind - The Prologue
description:
Description:

You wake up by the sound of your alarm clock... 

You had a strange dream. What could it mean.

Everything would've been easier, if you weren't blind.

This is the prequel to Blind, a short horror text game. Find out how the protagonist - you, got into the story of Blind.

I recommend you play Blind first, which you can find on my itch.io page.
